programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The auction takes place in the old Chisholm Trail city of Fort Worth; Englishman David Kay returns and gets chippy with the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: A local auctioneer stirs up things when the buyers return to Fort Worth; Jenny and Mary disagree on the value of their purchases; Victor's protege stands to lose the most.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders return to the city of DeSoto; Jenny seeks out raw materials; Kenny and Matt fight over industrial tools; Mary's find leads her to the state's oldest Italian restaurant.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: In the city of DeSoto, Ricky and Bubba hope to obtain an antique mannequin; a mystery bidder sets his sights on a locker containing Willie Nelson memorabilia.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Victor hopes a return to the town of Waxahachie will stop his losing streak; Moe and Mary believe an antique instrument will yield big returns; Bubba and Ricky reel in a surprise.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Bubba returns to Killeen, Texas, where he attended high school; Victor unearths Civil War collectibles; Jenny attempts to crack a safe.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders return to the wealthy suburb of Lake Highlands; Bubba finds a magic book; Moe, Mary and Jenny clash with old rivals.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Former NFL safety Roy Williams battles Lesa for a locker with a dark item; one buyer obtains a piece of American history.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba face off against Kenny and other locals in the eastern Texas city of Tyler; Jenny uncovers a holy grail of the music world.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave hopes to score top-quality merchandise when the auction action shifts to Koreatown; Mary's locker comes with a high price; Brandi becomes annoyed with Jarrod's antics.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Midnight in the Gardena Good and Evil
programme.desc: Barry hires two psychics to "see" inside storage lockers; Jarrod and Brandi hope to save their store by taking a gamble on a unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene is groomed to vanquish the competition; Ivy learns an important locker lesson; Darrell spends the most money of his career.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The gang travels to Long Beach, Calif., where it uncovers surfer and cowboy items, flare guns, and maintenance equipment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers venture into downtown Los Angeles, where they participate in a vault auction; Jarrod and Brandi put all their marbles in some mystery boxes.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit El Monte, Calif.; the Harris Brothers go into stealth mode; Jarrod and Brandi feel charitable; Darrell hopes a big pole will vault him to the top.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers look for great deals in Costa Mesa, Calif., an area that Dave knows all too well; Mary attempts to spend big; Darrell hopes to shut out a competitor.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Locker in the West
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi uncover a sweet locker in Santa Ana, Calif.; Mary looks for something more collectible; Darrell's find may equal another big win for the Gambler.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A locker in Whittier, Calif., features a high payoff; Dave eyes a unit with a stockpile of antiques; Barry's locker may contain old weapons.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura face tough competition in the neighborhood of North Hollywood; Dave's locker may be a hit; Mary eyes two units that, if purchased together, would make a perfect fit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers trek to Murietta, Calif.; Jeff Jarred resurfaces but that doesn't sit well with the Dotsons; Barry Weiss figures a couple things out; Jarrod and Brandi gamble on a unit and the results are electric.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy and Rene team up in an attempt to stop Darrell and Brandon's planned buying spree; a date reignites Jarrod and Brandi's passion for purchasing storage units.
